extendedInfo.description: The map view give smooth scrolling through 7 days of data. The graph view gives the weeks rain, wind and cloud forecast at a glance. Forecast data includes rain, wind, cloud, temperature, pressure humidity and wave height (for fishermen and surfers).Features:- Map view of data with smooth scrolling.- Graph of the weeks rain, cloud, wind, temperature, and pressure.- 7-day forecast Widget- Any location in the world.- Data includes rain, wind, cloud, temperature, pressure, humidity.- Wave height data for fishermen and surfers.*** FUTURE FEATURES: ***- Premium Ad-free subscriptions- Translations- Data validation- Polish, speed, bug fixes, etc...- More data, more graphs, more color.Do you like WeatherBomb? Do you want to get involved? Join the WeatherBomb G+ Community:https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/103625367127359885774*** Thanks for the crash reports. Keep them coming. **** Please contact me for feature request and bugs.. Please don't use the comments/ratings to report bugs. **** A NOTE ON BETA DEVELOPMENT ***Weather Bomb is still a beta release but can still be used for general use that doesn't risk your safety or others safety.

reviews.title: Unable to update temperature
reviews.comment: App updates everything else other than temperature on mobile data. Please fix this for a 5 start rating.
reviews.author: Madhu PK

reviews.title: Good app but with some spit and polish
reviews.comment: The app is pretty worthwhile it updates with a wireless internet connection. Unfortunately there is no way to reset the location of that weather once the app has been initialized. It would also be better if you could look at many locations at once. Thanks for the app.
reviews.author: Justin Bunyan

reviews.title: Great update. Great customer service!
reviews.comment: Thanks, Duane for letting me know about the server mishap. Reinstalled and all is well. One of my favorites!
reviews.author: Celia Washington

reviews.comment: Nice, really nice!
reviews.author: Matthew Howard

reviews.title: Works great.
reviews.comment: Accurate weather and. The weather forcast map is also accurate.   the service is prompt when you need help. Thanks dw.
reviews.author: yarddogbbq

reviews.comment: Awesome !
reviews.author: Richard Feiler

reviews.title: Super great
reviews.comment: Unusual but instantly usable interface. Incredibly responsive developer. Great work.
reviews.author: Michael Adams

reviews.title: Reply
reviews.comment: Hi Daune. I have resolved the problem. Appearently, I should have uninstalled the previous version first. All is well now. Thanks...
reviews.author: Russ Gittens

reviews.title: Excellent weather radar app
reviews.comment: However, widget doesn\'t work on atrix Android 2.3.6 anymore.   Widget works ok on ics 4.0.4 tablet.  Thanks for your efforts for providing this invaluable app!
reviews.author: steven leong

reviews.title: Very good....need pro,hate ads
reviews.comment: As for the icon,I\'ve had really fancy ones,but the forecasts were about as accurate as the the imf\'s forecasts,update,a reviewer didn\'t like icon,my point,once the forecast is right (unlike the imf\'s)the icon dosnt really matter
reviews.author: James Mullins

reviews.title: Hideous Icon
reviews.comment: I know its probably low on the priority list but the icon looks like something from windows 95. Its a great app though.
reviews.author: Jon Bradley

reviews.title: Widget Blank
reviews.comment: ..... after latest update.  Update.... Just looked at my phone again after 30 minutes and it\'s back to normal. Should have been more patient I guess.
reviews.author: Burwil Chance

reviews.title: This is definitely the bomb!!
reviews.comment: I was referred to this application by a colleague of mine. It is not a real time weather application, but makes use of the long-range forecast models to present weather data and a really cool graphic formats. Just playing with the application. I\'ve learned a lot about how weather works and interacts. For instance, I learned of the Great Lakes of the US and Canada, add energy to the storm center rolling across it. Using the interactive features of the application I was able to make that particular aha moment
reviews.author: Mark Thistlewaite

reviews.title: Aweseome forecasting tool.
reviews.comment: Tons of useful data for 7 days (even though I never believe more than 1 day out in any forecast.  If you are looking for real time weather radar that\'s the only thing missing from this app. However I have another app for radar.  This gives me DETAILS you don\'t normally get with other apps.  Rather than go on, just download it and try it, its free.
reviews.author: Les Fairall

reviews.title: Best Weather App
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for a weather app like this for awhile. I love the data it provides. I will definitely be buying the ad free version in the future. Please keep up the good work.  This will be my go to app for this ski season.
reviews.author: Scott McLean

reviews.title: Extremely useful app.
reviews.comment: I use this app all the time.
reviews.author: Bracey Summers

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Tons of useful info. Weather over time animated feature rocks !!!!
reviews.author: Pushkar Gejji

reviews.title: Brilliant weather visualisation
reviews.comment: This app displays lots of different weather data in an awesome and exceptionally useful interactive visualisation.
reviews.author: Holger Reusch

reviews.title: D.k
reviews.comment: Excellent
reviews.author: Devesh Gupta

reviews.comment: So far so good
